Class: Marshal

Marshal

new Marshal

Creates a Serialization/Deserialization object for a column family

Parameters:
Name Type Description
type String The type to create the marshaller for (eg. 'BytesType' or 'org.apache...CompositeType(BytesType,UTF8Type))
